text: Chief Justice Sheikh Anwarul Haq ( ; 11 May 1917 â€“ 3 March 1995), was a Pakistani jurist and an academic. He was the 9th Chief Justice of Pakistan from 23 September 1977 until resigning on 25 March 1981. Between 1973 to 1978, he was the Acting (and is sometime referred to as the 20th) President of Pakistan. ==References== Category:1917 births Category:1995 deaths Category:Chief Justices of Pakistan Category:Presidents of Pakistan Category:Politicians from Lahore
title: Sheikh Anwarul Haq
